text: Partick Thistle Football Club is a professional football team based at Firhill Stadium in Glasgow, Scotland. Despite their name, the club are based in the Maryhill area of the city, and have not played in Partick since 1908. Currently, the team play in the Scottish championship, the second division of the Scottish league pyramid. ==References== Category:Scottish football clubs Category:1876 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1870s establishments in Scotland
title: Partick Thistle F.C.
